item.title: 317 [Delta] Conquering Custom Skill! MUST SEE! [Delta] 317
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Difficulty - 1-7/10 (Depends on your coding level)
Knowledge Needed - Booleans, Voids, Commands, Varibles… etc.
Files Edited (MAKE BACKUPS!!!) - Client.java, NPCHandler.java, Wearing.java, Player.java, AutoSpawn.CFG, Class5.java

I DO NOT RECOMMEND ADDING THIS INTO YOUR SERVER. I MADE IT WHEN I WAS A FAIL CODER; AND IT IS A PRETTY USELESS SKILL AND DOESN’T HAVE ANY SORT OF METHOD SHORTENING, WHICH WILL CAUSE YOUR SERVER LAG! IF YOU ARE EXPERIENCED AND WANT TO TAKE THIS AND SHORTEN IT. BE MY GUEST!

[size=14pt]SERVER SIDED[/size]

Part 1
[size=24pt]What is Conquering?[/size]

Conquering is a Custom skill. I used this as a base code for it: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,451921.0.html Conqering is 10 stages that consist of minions and bosses. Each stage will require you to kill a Boss. Killing the boss will take you to the next stage. You’ll automatically be moved to the next stage once you kill a boss. You get XP from killing Conquering Minions and by advancing Conquering stages, And Completing the dungeon. To go to Conquering you must talk to robert the strong.

Part 2: Creating the skill

Open up Client.java and search up

public String statName[]

You should see something like…

public String statName[] = { "attack", "defence", "strength", "hitpoints"

At the end add:

, "conquering"

This makes it so it recognizes conquering as a stat.

Next find

int CLRunecrafting

And add this under it

int CLConquering = server.Wearing.GetCLConquering(wearID);

This makes it so it recognizes Conquering as a skill in wearing.java (will be explained later on)

Then find

if (CLRunecrafting > getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]))

And add this under it:

if (CLConquering > getLevelForXP(playerXP[21])) { sM("You are not a high enough level to use this item."); sM("You need to have a "+statName[playerConquering]+" level of "+CLConquering+"."); GoFalse = true; }

Self explanitory?

Close Client.java, and open Player.java and Wearing.java

In player.java search up

public int playerRunecrafting = 20;

And under it add

public int playerConquering = 21;

This makes it so conquering is recognized as skill #21 which is supossed to be construction, but most servers don’t have construction.

Then, In wearing.java look for:

public int GetCLRunecrafting(int ItemID) {

And under

if (ItemName.startsWith("Runecrafting hood")) { return 99; } return 1; }

Add:

public int GetCLConquering(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Conquering cape")) { return 99; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Conquering hood")) { return 99; } return 1; }

This makes it so you have to be level 99 to wear the conquering cape and hood.

What we just did in total: Added the Conquering skill

Part 3: Making it Teleport you when you killed boss, give you XP, and making it reset your progress if you teleport.

Open up Client.java and search up

public void process() {

Scroll down until you see…

sM("You are the champion!"); yell("Current winner of fight pits: "+playerName+"!"); followID = 0; addItem(7462, 1); }

Under it add… http://pastebin.com/8y1fMGLv

Sorry about pastebin. the stupid 20,000 character limit thingy -.-

What this code means:

if(!isInConquering1() && !isInConquering2() && !isInConquering3() && !isInConquering4() && !isInConquering5() && !isInConquering6() && !isInConquering7() && !isInConquering8() && !isInConquering9() && !isInConquering10()) { conquerstage = 0; killedBoss1 = false; killedBoss2 = false; killedBoss3 = false; killedBoss4 = false; killedBoss5 = false; killedBoss6 = false; killedBoss7 = false; killedBoss8 = false; killedBoss9 = false; killedBoss10 = false; } else {

If you aren’t in any of the conquering stages, it will reset your progress too 0 so you will have too start over. If you are a good coder and want to remove this go ahead. If you are just a noob leecher you will get 100 errors trying to remove it (; (I think… too lazy too count backets lol)

if (conquerstage == 10 && killedBoss10 == true) { addSkillXP(500000, 21); sM("You've Completed Stage 10 of Conquering!"); sM("Congratulations!!! You have completed Conquering!!"); conquerstage = 0; toX = 3085; toY = 3500; heightLevel = 0; yell(""+playerName+" has just completed Conquering!"); }

(Last stage): It’s basically saying that if your conquer stage is 10, and you killed the boss, it will add 500,000 XP too your conquering skill, Will send you the message typed in the code, reset your conquer stage to 0, will teleport you too the XCOORD: 3085 and YCOORD: 3500, and it will yell that you have completed conquering. All the codes are similar, just try and understand it.

Part 4: Going into the Conquering stages

In client.java search up “// first Click npc”, and scroll down until you see something like

if(NPCID == 3781){
inGame = false;
toX = 2657;
toY = 2639;
}[/code]

Under it add

[code]	if(NPCID == 2639) {
	chatMsg("You have just been Teled to Conquering", "Good Luck");
	toX = 3547;
	toY = 3560;
	sM("You're now in Conquering Stage 1!");
	sM("This is a very easy stage!");
	conquerstage = 1;
	heightLevel = 0;
	}[/code]

Understand the code: Bascally if the npcid is 2639, it will use npcdialogue too send you the message above, tele you too the XCOORD 3547 and the YCOORD 3560, send you the message shown above, you will be in conquerstage 1 and your height will be 0.

[u]Part 5: Adding Booleans, Varibles, Voids etc.[/u]

in Client.java Under: "public class client extends Player implements Runnable {" add:

[code]	public boolean killedBoss1 = false;
	public boolean killedBoss2 = false;
	public boolean killedBoss3 = false;
	public boolean killedBoss4 = false;
	public boolean killedBoss5 = false;
	public boolean killedBoss6 = false;
	public boolean killedBoss7 = false;
	public boolean killedBoss8 = false;
	public boolean killedBoss9 = false;
	public boolean killedBoss10 = false;[/code]

And somewhere else under "public class client extends Player implements Runnable {" Add:

[code]	public void chatMsg(String message, String title){
	sendFrame200(4883, 591);
	sendFrame126(title, 4884);
	sendFrame126(message, 4885);
	sendFrame164(4882);
	NpcDialogueSend = true;
	}[/code]

In the same place add this:

[code]        public void conquer() {
                sendQuest("Conquering Information", 8144);
                clearQuestInterface();
                sendQuest("Conqering is Custom Skill Created by me.", 8147);
                sendQuest("Conqering is 10 stages with minions and bosses.", 8149);
                sendQuest("Each stage will require you to kill a Boss.", 8150);
                sendQuest("Killing the boss will take you to the next stage.", 8151);
                sendQuest("You'll automatically be moved to the next stage", 8152);
                sendQuest("Once you kill a boss. Trying too stay there and", 8153);
		sendQuest("Train Conquering isn't reccomended unless you", 8154);
		sendQuest("Have very high prayer and prayer pots. You get", 8155);
		sendQuest("XP from killing bosses, minions, and completing", 8156);
		sendQuest("Conquering dungeons. Running is reccomended for", 8157);
		sendQuest("Fast XP!!!", 8158);
                sendQuest("Conquering Level: @red@" + playerLevel[21] + "", 8159);
		sendQuest("Conquering XP: @red@" + getLevelForXP(playerXP[21]) + "", 8160);
                sendQuest("Conquering Coded Entirely by: Zezimo", 8161);
                sendQuestSomething(8143);
                showInterface(8134);
                flushOutStream();
                        }[/code]

Next find Find "public boolean isIn" and find where it says isin(something) and shows some coords under it.
Under that add...

[code]    public boolean isInConquering1()
    {
        return absX >= 3540 && absX <= 3558 && absY >= 3554 && absY <=3571;
    }

    public boolean isInConquering2()
    {
        return absX >= 2713 && absX <= 2763 && absY >= 9463 && absY <=9521;
    }

    public boolean isInConquering3()
    {
        return absX >= 2755 && absX <= 2814 && absY >= 9298 && absY <=9359;
    }

    public boolean isInConquering4()
    {
        return absX >= 2743 && absX <= 2775 && absY >= 9309 && absY <=9330;
    }

    public boolean isInConquering5()
    {
        return absX >= 2364 && absX <= 2440 && absY >= 4670 && absY <=4738;
    }

    public boolean isInConquering6()
    {
        return absX >= 2840 && absX <= 2871 && absY >= 9756 && absY <=9787;
    }

    public boolean isInConquering7()
    {
        return absX >= 2595 && absX <= 2621 && absY >= 4439 && absY <=4459;
    }

    public boolean isInConquering8()
    {
        return absX >= 2451 && absX <= 2466 && absY >= 4955 && absY <=4970;
    }

    public boolean isInConquering9()
    {
        return absX >= 2588 && absX <= 2619 && absY >= 4763 && absY <=4785;
    }

    public boolean isInConquering10()
    {
        return absX >= 2792 && absX <= 2813 && absY >= 4706 && absY <=4736;
    }

^^ Just means that if your in the specified Coords, then your in the conquering area, we need this because that means if your not in the area, you won’t get conquering xp for killing npcs.

Next, in PLAYER.JAVA, add

public int conquerstage;

This makes it so it recognizes conquerstage as a variable

Next find “} else if (token.equals(“character-rights”)) {”

and under it add:

} else if (token.equals("character-conquerstage")) { conquerstage = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Next find:

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-rights = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(playerRights), 0, Integer .toString(playerRights).length());

And under it add:

characterfile.write("character-conquerstage = ", 0, 25); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(conquerstage), 0, Integer.toString(conquerstage).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Part 6: Adding Help Command

if(command.startsWith("conquer")){ conquer(); }

This makes it so once you do ::conquer it will call public void conquer() { and do whatever the code inside there is, in this case it’s a guide.

Part 7: Objects

Find “makeglobalobject” and add this to the list of objects.

makeGlobalObject(2764, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2386, 4693, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2386, 4692, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2386, 4691, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2763, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2762, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2761, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2760, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2759, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2758, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2757, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2756, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2608, 4442, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2607, 4442, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2723, 9487, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2723, 9486, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2723, 9485, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2738, 9498, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2739, 9498, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2740, 9498, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2741, 9498, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2742, 9498, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2774, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2773, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2772, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2771, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2770, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2769, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2768, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2767, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2766, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2765, 9328, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9786, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9785, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9784, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9783, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9782, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9781, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9780, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9779, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9778, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9777, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9776, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9775, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9774, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2870, 9773, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2463, 4772, 1, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2463, 4771, 1, 0, 10);

Part 8: NPC minions giving you XP, and bosses

Open NPCHandler.java and Find “public void process() {” and under it add

//1 CONQUERING START! if(npcs[i].npcType == 79 && temp.conquerstage == 1){ temp.killedBoss1 = true; } if(npcs[i].npcType == 78 && temp.conquerstage == 1){ temp.addSkillXP(200, 21); } //2 if(npcs[i].npcType == 205 && temp.conquerstage == 2){ temp.killedBoss2 = true; } if(npcs[i].npcType == 194 && temp.conquerstage == 2){ temp.addSkillXP(400, 21); } //3 if(npcs[i].npcType == 176 && temp.conquerstage == 3){ temp.killedBoss3 = true; } if(npcs[i].npcType == 193 && temp.conquerstage == 3){ temp.addSkillXP(600, 21); } if(npcs[i].npcType == 181 && temp.conquerstage == 3){ temp.addSkillXP(600, 21); } //4 if(npcs[i].npcType == 941 && temp.conquerstage == 4){ temp.killedBoss4 = true; } if(npcs[i].npcType == 51 && temp.conquerstage == 4){ temp.addSkillXP(800, 21); } //5 if(npcs[i].npcType == 54 && temp.conquerstage == 5){ temp.killedBoss5 = true; } if(npcs[i].npcType == 53 && temp.conquerstage == 5){ temp.addSkillXP(1000, 21); } //6 if(npcs[i].npcType == 677 && temp.conquerstage == 6){ temp.killedBoss6 = true; } if(npcs[i].npcType == 82 && temp.conquerstage == 6){ temp.addSkillXP(1200, 21); } if(npcs[i].npcType == 83 && temp.conquerstage == 6){ temp.addSkillXP(1250, 21); } //7 if(npcs[i].npcType == 97 && temp.conquerstage == 7){ temp.killedBoss7 = true; } if(npcs[i].npcType == 95 && temp.conquerstage == 7){ temp.addSkillXP(1400, 21); } if(npcs[i].npcType == 96 && temp.conquerstage == 7){ temp.addSkillXP(1400, 21); } //8 if(npcs[i].npcType == 126 && temp.conquerstage == 8){ temp.killedBoss8 = true; } //9 if(npcs[i].npcType == 2252 && temp.conquerstage == 9){ temp.killedBoss9 = true; } //10 CONQUERING END! if(npcs[i].npcType == 94 && temp.conquerstage == 10){ temp.killedBoss10 = true; }

This basically just means if the npc you kill is the number specified above, it will ethier tell the server that killedboss# = true, which then makes you teleport too the next stage, or it will add exp.

Part 9: AutoSpawn.CFG

Add this in Autospawn

Part 10: Changing Npc levels

Go into your Client Files and find class5.java, if your not retarded, you will know where too add this (with the rest of the npc codes…)

if(i == 79) { class5.aString65 = "Death Wing"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 100; //combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "A Conquering boss".getBytes(); // NPC description } if(i == 205) { class5.aString65 = "Salarin The Twisted"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 225; //combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "A Conquering boss".getBytes(); // NPC description } if(i == 176) { class5.aString65 = "Witch"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 300; //combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "A Conquering boss".getBytes(); // NPC description } if(i == 97) { class5.aString65 = "White Wolf"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 398; //combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "A Conquering boss".getBytes(); // NPC description } if(i == 126) { class5.aString65 = "Otherworldy Being"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 578; //combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "A Conquering boss".getBytes(); // NPC description } if(i == 2252) { class5.aString65 = "Mounted Terrorbird Gnome"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 698; //combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "A Conquering boss".getBytes(); // NPC description } if(i == 94) { class5.aString65 = "Skeleton Mage"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 987; //combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "A Conquering boss".getBytes(); // NPC description }

^^ Changed the NPC levels.

And were Done, if you want to add the conquering skillcape, pm me!!
